article_title: Here's Why States Must Resist The Temptation To Expand Medicaid

article_metadata.description: The 20 states that have thus far avoided expanding Medicaid must continue to resist. If many more state dominos fall, Obamacare's multibillion-dollar expansion will be nearly impossible to undo -- even if Republicans sweep the elections in 2016.
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
